alert.note: Alert for Ojai Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 06 at 6:13AM PST until January 06 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 degrees expected. For the Wind Advisory, northwest to north winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Ojai Valley. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 10 AM PST this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 7 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially drivers of for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation. Extended exposure to cold can cause hypothermia for animals and people.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.
